scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Katie
scrape.text: 4.5/5. I devoured this on my two 7 hours bus rides within the last few days. If any of you remember by review of Dare Me by Megan Abbott, I feel very similarly about this. It's shocking, acerbic, and incredibly clever. That fucking waiter's pinky. Jesus. I will certainly be looking into anything else written by Koch.
